reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Narda Clone, Single coil  26g Kanthal @.7 ohms.  25W Power, Half wicked with Tencel

**Testing:** OOO Marshmallow (Vanilla) @ 2%. 70/30 VG/PG, steeped 17 days.

**Flavor Description:**  One of those really big marshmallows meant for toasting on a campfire. Like you stuck the whole damn thing in your mouth. I can even taste the sugar on the outside. It is not as fluffy as Capella but pretty thick and sweet. It is very smooth and rich at 2%.

**Off-flavors:**  Nothing you wouldn't get from eating a marshmallow irl!

**Throat Hit:**  This flavor is very smooth as to be expected from any cream type flavor.

**Uses & Pairings:**  This can be used where you want an authentic marshmallow flavor. I would also use this as a generic sweetener as the marshmallow flavor is not overwhelming. Might be nice with whipped cream for a nice fluffy fruit and cream. 

**Notes:**
 This flavor comes out quite a bit with a steep. Shake and vape it is just kind of hot sweetness but the vanilla notes really show up after a few days. 



**[DIY_eJuice Flavor Reviews](https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/wiki/index/flavor_reviews)**

If you have different opinions on the flavor or any ideas on how to use it please post them in the comments. Lets start a discussion!
reviewsJson.author: mlNikon
reviewsJson.title: Marshmallow
